## Comprehensive, end-to-end compensation management 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63722fa7f631894eb6feb598/663bd61db104102eb72891e3_GLI.gif)
[Keep a pulse on the marketMake more informed compensation decisions that keep you ahead of the market. Benchmark against real-time salary and equity data from 7,500+ top private and public companies.Learn about Market Data](https://pave.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63722fa7f631894eb6feb598/663bd61db104102eb72891e3_GLI.gif)Get deeper data insightsExpanding internationally? Refining your equity program? Ensure your practices stay competitive. Go a layer deeper with granular insights from salary and equity programs across 55+ countries and 90+ international cities.Learn about Premium Market Data](https://pave.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[Optimize your compensation strategyStreamline every comp process from a band refresh, to planning, to merit cycles, and beyond—all in one, powerful end-to-end compensation platform.Learn about Compensation Workflows](https://pave.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)[Ensure everyone understands compGet everyone—from the C-suite, to managers, to employees—bought-in on comp. ## Behind the benchmarks
The numbers powering Pave's real-time data
8500+
### Participating companies
1000000+
### employee records
$186B
### in total comp managed
28k+
### executive comp records
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63722fa7f631894eb6feb598/662c8dd1d676c8b6bae23111_Screenshot%202024-04-16%20at%2012.11%201.png)
## Connected, real-time data
Get set-up in minutes, not months. Connect your HRIS directly to Pave. Eliminate disparate systems and spreadsheets to get a full view of your company's total compensation. 
[Sign up free](https://pave.com/<https:/app.pave.com/signup>)
### Your company's biggest expense—optimized
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63722fa7f631894eb6feb598/6631937fe74252e3a4673d8f_Frame%20868.svg)
**Real-time salary and equity data** from 7,500+ company HRIS integrations, so you can benchmark ahead of the market.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63722fa7f631894eb6feb598/6631937fbdcb81d0e320f9f3_Frame%20871.svg)
**Actionable data fast;** no more waiting months for survey data. One hour, one integration, guided by the world-class Pave team, is all it takes.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63722fa7f631894eb6feb598/6631937f73831ac40ddf79cd_Frame%20873.svg)
**Granular, robust, and accurate** comp data across job families, equity practices, geos, , especially equity compensation data.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63722fa7f631894eb6feb598/662c9ca0d0e9217e80892a6a_Frame%20872.svg)
**Flexible, precise end-to-end** platform maps to every unique and specific compensation strategy.
## Comp leaders say it best‍
The Pave product that has been the most helpful is Compensation Planning. When all the elements tie together and it’s set up properly, particularly with the permissioning and ability to ensure the right people can see the right things, Comp Planning makes a big difference for us. It’s a much, much better process than anything we could do with spreadsheets—and we did try (it was not pretty).
Jacob Wallenberg
VP, People & Talent, Ramp 
![Ramp](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63722fa7f631896277feb5c6/6786c49b6b3adc7dbbf05100_jacob%20wallenberg.jpeg)
I have found [Market Data] quite useful for pricing jobs in places where I have few employees. It is also a good sense to check against legacy market providers.
Neil Pfeiffer
Senior Manager Global Compensation, Workato
![Workato](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63722fa7f631896277feb5c6/6740bbd92b553478143e8f7c_neil%20pfeiffer.jpeg)
Pave has been invaluable in streamlining our compensation processes, enabling us to enhance transparency, drive employee engagement, and improve retention. With Pave’s data-driven approach, we’ve been able to make more strategic decisions around compensation, which has had a direct impact on our company's growth and ability to retain top talent. 
Evan Salisbury
VP of Total Rewards & People Support, Ancestry
![Ancestry](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63722fa7f631896277feb5c6/63ad51513ca698d4dde1d18b_617b65343c0bf0da7cce25f5_Evan%2520Salisbury.png)
I appreciate Pave’s real-time insights, along with the capability to easily filter for relevant peer data to ensure our team stays informed and agile.
Leah Springer
Director of Global Compensation, Grammarly
![Grammarly](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63722fa7f631896277feb5c6/6722b16ccfce062788f10f5e_leah_springer_headshot.jpeg)
Pave's Market Pricing tool increased my confidence in explaining how our compensation bands were developed. Since the logic lives in Pave, it will be easy to apply it in the future.
Ben Dickens
Senior HR Manager, Snapdocs
![Snapdocs](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63722fa7f631896277feb5c6/670da23c2546ff96a0b6aac6_ben-dickens.jpeg)
In previous cycles, we had to pull data into spreadsheets, aggregate it, and come up with complex, error-prone formulas to benchmark. Even small changes would take a lot of time. With Market Pricing from Pave, we can view all our market data and encode our comp philosophy, enabling us to reprice faster with more confidence.
Yvonne Liu
Senior Manager, Compensation, Clio
![Clio](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63722fa7f631896277feb5c6/670da0f1f38d58b6baceb696_yvonne-liu.jpeg)
With Pave, we can offer transparency for managers in terms of how they should reward employees and also how they can responsibly allocate their budget. It’s a huge benefit to have managers aligned and bought into the comp philosophy and how it’s executed so they can have better conversations with their employees.
Amelia Skagias
Manager, Compensation, Cockroach Labs
![Cockroach Labs](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63722fa7f631896277feb5c6/6459827f7f7d2c29eafcac6b_Amelia%20Skagias.jpeg)
Pave has been an amazing compensation tool for our portfolio. Integrating via API has dramatically lowered the upfront effort to get started, eliminated the need to manually upload their data year over year, and given them a truly real-time view of compensation benchmarks.
Atli Thorkelsson
VP of Talent Network, Redpoint
![Redpoint](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63722fa7f631896277feb5c6/63ad5152461adb2a43d8f34f_619c2eecb911740c32c89749_Atli%2520Thorkelsson.jpeg)
Our goal at Tessian is to ensure that all of our salaries are fair and competitive which is why we use Pave for our benchmarking. Not only is their platform easy to use but we can be confident that the benchmarking data that we’re pulling is second to none.
Inês Van Deuren
People Operations Manager, Tessian
![Tessian](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63722fa7f631896277feb5c6/63ad5152461adb265bd8f352_628569bb71b492663b24832e_In%25C3%25AAs%2520Van%2520Deuren.jpeg)
We run a really robust compensation process. Pave’s compensation planner makes it 10x easier and simpler to communicate employee compensation to our leadership team.
Marisa Fezza
Director of People, Ro
![RO](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63722fa7f631896277feb5c6/63ad51529a624b4f00b74684_617b65343c0bf055bdce25ba_Marrisa%2520Fezza%2520-%2520R.jpeg)
Pave's comp benchmarking tool is superb. Any start-up or scale-up that wants to use the most comprehensive dataset to make compensation decisions should be using Pave.
Emma Phillips
Investment Partner, LocalGlobe
![LocalGlobe](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63722fa7f631896277feb5c6/63ad5152da54a25bac0ec6c7_62856fec1c4ceeb520790c65_emma%2520philips.jpeg)
We didn’t have to retrain our team to talk about equity in a certain way, the tool just reflected the dialogue we already wanted to have with candidates and employees.
Brit Malinauskas
VP of People and Workplace, HOVER
![Hover](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63722fa7f631896277feb5c6/63ad51516c21e66e21c76cd9_617b65343c0bf0cebcce25f6_Brit%2520-%2520Hover.jpeg)
Real-time, global compensation data is crucial for any company that's trying to stay competitive. Pave is simply the best compensation benchmarking tool for any venture-backed tech company.
Dominic Jacquesson
VP of Insights & Talent, Index Ventures
![Index Ventures](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63722fa7f631896277feb5c6/63ad5151dd43e222ea6ce025_62b36fbc7ba19a852b339696_Dominic%2520Jacquesson-min.jpeg)
In order to hire the best talent in today's market, we need real time compensation benchmarks. Pave compensation data is just that: not only does it provide verified cash and equity compensation benchmarks, but it's free. Our leadership and people teams have insight into compensation benchmarks like never before.
Sultan Murad Saidov
Co-Founder and President, Beamery
![Beamery](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63722fa7f631896277feb5c6/63ad5151461adbaa25d8f344_6243f5717e079cba5fb0095c_beamery%2520headshot.jpeg)
Real-time compensation benchmarking data is the most valuable asset in hiring and retaining top talent. Pave's platform gives Bessemer portfolio companies a huge advantage by enabling secure and instant access to data.
Miia Laukkarinen
Vice President of Talent, Bessemer Venture Partners
![Bessemer Venture Partners](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63722fa7f631896277feb5c6/63ad5151dd43e2772f6ce022_619c2e86562c871bb9dee4a4_Mia_headshot.jpeg)

**Pave - Elevating Compensation Management**

Founded in 2019 and hailing from San Francisco, Pave is reshaping how companies handle compensation. Remember a time when spreadsheets were the norm for managing salaries and equity? Pave aims to obliterate that old world. Their mission? To allow businesses to plan, communicate, and benchmark their compensation in real-time, making smarter decisions powered by seamless integrations with HRIS, ATS, and Cap Tables.

After being part of Y Combinator’s Batch S20, Pave has grown into a robust company with a team of 170 employees. The platform’s backbone is its real-time data, helping over 8,500 companies benchmark against a staggering 1,000,000 employee records—in fact, they manage a total compensation data pool worth $186 billion. 

At its core, Pave addresses a critical business need: compensation is often the largest expense a company faces. With its features like **Market Data**, **Compensation Planning**, **Benchmarking**, and **Total Rewards**, Pave provides an end-to-end solution, enabling HR teams to manage compensation more efficiently and transparently. This is not just a nice-to-have; it’s crucial in a talent market where offering competitive salaries isn't just beneficial—it's essential.

Some standout features of Pave include:
- **Real-Time Comparisons:** With data flowing in from over 7,500 HRIS integrations, companies can quickly access current salary and equity benchmarks.
- **Flexible Compensation Workflows:** Businesses can tailor their compensation strategies to match unique employee needs and market conditions.
